plant.question: I am green and grow in the ground. Animals like to eat me. What am I?

hints.text: 🌱 I am often found in a garden.
🐰 Bunnies love to munch on me.
🥗 You can eat me in a salad!

plant.question: I am tall and have a trunk. Birds like to build nests in me. What am I?

hints.text: 🌳 I have many branches.
🐿️ Squirrels like to climb on me.
🍂 My leaves change color in the fall.

plant.question: I am colorful and smell sweet. Bees love to visit me. What am I?

hints.text: 🌷 I grow in the garden.
🐝 I need the sun to grow.
💐 People give me as a gift.

plant.question: I am long and thin, and I help a flower stand up tall. What am I?

hints.text: ⬆️ I hold the flower head high.
🌿 I am usually green.
✂️ You can cut me with scissors.

plant.question: I grow underground and hold the plant in place. What am I?

hints.text: 🥕 Carrots grow here too.
💧 I drink water from the ground.
💪 I keep the plant from falling over.

plant.question: I am a small, hard thing that can grow into a big plant. What am I?

hints.text: 🐦 Birds sometimes eat me.
🌱 I need water and sun to grow.
🪴 You can plant me in the ground.

plant.question: I am green and prickly. I grow on a cactus. What am I?

hints.text: 🌵 I keep animals from eating the cactus.
⚠️ Be careful, I can poke you!
🏜️ Cacti are found in the desert.

plant.question: I am the food that grows on some plants, and I often have seeds inside. What am I?

hints.text: 🍎 I can be sweet and juicy.
🐛 An apple is an example
👩‍🌾 Farmers grow me in orchards.

plant.question: I am the outside covering of a tree trunk. What am I?

hints.text: 🪵 I protect the tree from the weather.
🐜 Sometimes insects live under me.
🪓 You can't chop down a tree without getting through me.

plant.question: I am a part of a plant that spreads out to catch sunlight. What am I?

hints.text: ☀️ I help the plant make its own food.
🍃 I fall off the tree in autumn.
🐛 Caterpillars like to eat me.

ocean.question: I am big and blue, and fishies swim in me. What am I?

hints.text: 💧 I am made of water.
🚢 Boats float on me.
🐳 Whales live here.

ocean.question: I have a shell and I crawl slowly on the sand. What am I?

hints.text: 🐌 I am very slow.
🏠 I carry my house on my back.
🥬 I like to eat leafy greens.

ocean.question: I wave to you when you are on the shore. What am I?

hints.text: 👋 I move back and forth.
🌊 I am part of the ocean.
🏖️ I can make sandcastles wet.

ocean.question: I have eight arms and live in the sea. What am I?

hints.text: 🖐️ I have many arms.
🐙 I squirt ink.
🔵 I can change color.

ocean.question: I make my home in the sea and have a pointy nose. What am I?

hints.text: 👃 I have a long nose, like Pinocchio!
🌊 I swim in the ocean.
🐬 I am a type of whale but smaller

ocean.question: I live in a shell under the sea. Sometimes I have a pearl. What am I?

hints.text: 🐚 I am a shellfish.
✨ Sometimes I make something shiny.
🌊 I live on the ocean floor.

ocean.question: I have a big mouth and lots of teeth, and I swim in the ocean. What am I?

hints.text: 🦷 I have sharp teeth.
🦈 Some people are scared of me.
🐟 I eat other fish.

ocean.question: I am very big, I swim in the ocean, and people sometimes hunt me for my oil. What am I?

hints.text: 🐳 I am bigger than a dolphin.
🌊 I live in the sea but breathe air.
🎶 I sing songs under the water.

ocean.question: I am not a fish, but I live in the ocean and I have tentacles that can sting you. What am I?

hints.text: 👻 I am see-through.
🌊 I float in the water.
⚡ I can give you a little shock.

ocean.question: I am made of lots of tiny shells and rocks. The ocean washes me up on the shore. What am I?

hints.text: 🏖️ You can build castles with me.
🦶 It can be hot to walk on me.
⏳ I am made of tiny grains.
